1: <sup>1</sup> The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
2: <sup>2</sup> He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.
3: <sup>3</sup> He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name’s sake.
4: <sup>4</sup> Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.
5: <sup>5</sup> Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil; my cup runneth over.
6: <sup>6</sup> Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of the LORD for ever.
